subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: C. J. Fair scored 13 points and No. 2 Syracuse scored the final 6 points of the game to beat No. 19 Louisville, 52-51, ending a seven-game losing streak to the Cardinals.
snippet: C. J. Fair scored 13 points and No. 2 Syracuse scored the final 6 points of the game to beat No. 19 Louisville, 52-51, ending a seven-game losing streak to the Cardinals.
